narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: United Eg LLC is a Clinical Medical Laboratory provider based in Lombard, IL. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $11.1M in Medicaid payments across 140K claims.

narrative.title: Why This Matters
narrative.text: At $11.1M in Medicaid payments, this provider represents significant public healthcare spending. Understanding where these dollars go helps ensure the program serves those who need it most.
